short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your fine GenAI prompts in one place. Paste directly from Extension. Export prompts to share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PromptKeeper is a simple yet effective Chrome extension designed to streamline the Prompt Engineering  process, to track and maintain all your GenAI Prompts, Context Preparation, GenAI Identity configuration in one place, to enhance productivity with convenient prompt reusability across generative AI evolving landscape. 

With a focus on user convenience and efficient management of writing prompts, this extension is ideal for new and existing generative AI users, looking to capture and organise their prompt ideas seamlessly, with export and import functionality to share prompt ideas with others and keep them backed up offline.

This is a rapidly evolving area with Generative AI use-case, and This PromptKeeper Chrome Extension will be evolved overtime, maintaining simplicity and effectiveness, used by my own team and myself throughout.

Main Prompt Management Features
- Save Prompts: Securely save your creative prompts with custom titles for easy retrieval.
- Delete Prompts: Remove unwanted prompts from your list with a single click.
- List Display: View all your prompts in a neatly organized list, with the most recent entries displayed at the top.
- Date and Time Stamps: Each saved prompt is automatically timestamped with the exact date and time of creation.

Import/Export Functionality
- Export Prompts: Safely export your prompts as a JSON file, for sharing
- Import Prompts: Upload your saved prompts from a JSON file, maintaining the structure and content exactly as it was when exported.

Stats Overview
- Word Count: Monitor the number of words in the currently selected prompt.
- Storage Usage: Keep track of the storage space consumed by your saved prompts.

Upcoming Features
- Integration with AI services for prompt testing.
- Automated prompt quality scoring.
- Cloud synchronisation of prompts across devices.
- User-defined prompt templates for quick reuse.
